CustomField.formula:
CASE( MONTH(DATEVALUE(ADR_Transfer_Date__c)),
1,'Q4', 2,'Q1', 3,'Q1', 4,'Q1', 5,'Q2', 6,'Q2', 7,'Q2', 8,'Q3', 9,'Q3', 10,'Q3', 11,'Q4', 12,'Q4',
NULL ) + '-' + IF( MONTH( DATEVALUE(ADR_Transfer_Date__c)) = 1,TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ADR_Transfer_Date__c))), TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ADR_Transfer_Date__c))+1))
CustomField.label: [Deprecated] Fiscal Quarter
